com.emc.ecs.nfsclient.rpc

Class RpcWrapper<S extends NfsRequestBase,T extends NfsResponseBase>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.ecs.nfsclient.rpc.RpcWrapper<S,T>

  • public class RpcWrapper<S extends NfsRequestBase,T extends NfsResponseBase>
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for NFS Server RPC calls, to handle unmarshalling, retries, and status checking.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RpcWrapper(java.lang.String server, int port, int retryWait, int maximumRetries, int maximumRequestSize, int rpcTimeout) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Xdr callRpc(java.lang.String serverIP, Xdr xdrRequest, boolean usePrivilegedPort)
      Basic RPC call functionality only.
      void callRpcChecked(S request, RpcResponseHandler<? extends T> responseHandler)
      Convenience wrapper for NFS RPC calls where the IP is determined by a byte[] key.
      void callRpcNaked(S request, T response)
      Make the call using the Request ip key to determine the IP address for communication.
      void callRpcNaked(S request, T response, java.lang.String ipAddress)
      Make the call to a specified IP address.
      void callRpcWrapped(S request, RpcResponseHandler<? extends T> responseHandler)
      Make the wrapped call and unmarshall the returned Xdr to a response, getting the IP key from the request.
      void callRpcWrapped(S request, RpcResponseHandler<? extends T> responseHandler, java.lang.String ip)
      Make the wrapped call and unmarshall the returned Xdr to a response, using the given ip.

      Select an IP address to use for communication, based on the key and policy.
      void setPort(int port)
      Reset the port as necessary - used if the port changes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RpcWrapper

        public RpcWrapper(java.lang.String server,
                  int port,
                  int retryWait,
                  int maximumRetries,
                  int maximumRequestSize,
                  int rpcTimeout)
        Parameters:
        server - The remote server being called.
        port - The port on the remote server being used for this communication.
        retryWait - The wait in milliseconds.
        maximumRetries - The maximum number of retries.
        maximumRequestSize - The maximum request size in bytes.
        rpcTimeout - The timeout in seconds.

    • Method Detail

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port)
        Reset the port as necessary - used if the port changes.
        Parameters:
        port - The port on the remote server being used for this communication.

      • callRpcWrapped

        public void callRpcWrapped(S request,
                           RpcResponseHandler<? extends T> responseHandler)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Make the wrapped call and unmarshall the returned Xdr to a response, getting the IP key from the request. If an RPC Exception is being thrown, and retries remain, then log the exception and retry.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to send.
        responseHandler - A response handler.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • callRpcWrapped

        public void callRpcWrapped(S request,
                           RpcResponseHandler<? extends T> responseHandler,
                           java.lang.String ip)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Make the wrapped call and unmarshall the returned Xdr to a response, using the given ip. If an RPC Exception is being thrown, and retries remain, then log the exception and retry.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to send.
        responseHandler - A response handler.
        ip - The IP address to use for communication.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • callRpcChecked

        public void callRpcChecked(S request,
                           RpcResponseHandler<? extends T> responseHandler)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Convenience wrapper for NFS RPC calls where the IP is determined by a byte[] key. This method just determines the IP address and calls the basic method.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to send.
        responseHandler - A response handler.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • callRpcNaked

        public void callRpcNaked(S request,
                         T response)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Make the call using the Request ip key to determine the IP address for communication.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to send.
        response - A response to hold the returned data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • callRpcNaked

        public void callRpcNaked(S request,
                         T response,
                         java.lang.String ipAddress)
                  throws RpcException
        Make the call to a specified IP address.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to send.
        response - A response to hold the returned data.
        ipAddress - The IP address to use for communication.
        Throws:
        RpcException

      • callRpc

        public Xdr callRpc(java.lang.String serverIP,
                   Xdr xdrRequest,
                   boolean usePrivilegedPort)
            throws RpcException
        Basic RPC call functionality only.
        Parameters:
        serverIP - The endpoint of the server being called.
        xdrRequest - The Xdr data for the request.
        usePrivilegedPort -
        • If true, use a privileged local port (below 1024) for RPC communication.
        • If false, use any non-privileged local port for RPC communication.
        Returns:
        The Xdr data for the response.
        Throws:
        RpcException

      • chooseIP

        public java.lang.String chooseIP(byte[] key)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Select an IP address to use for communication, based on the key and policy.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to use when selecting an IP address.
        Returns:
        The IP address to use for communication.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
